summary: Scheduler Dashboard UI testing complete. All 9 frontend features tested and working. The page loads at /settings/scheduler, shows scheduler status with running indicator, next run time, last execution status, manual trigger button, global reminder settings with toggle and interval input, save settings, execution history, and sidebar link for Super Admin.

manual_trigger_functionality: Manual Trigger card displays with data-testid='manual-trigger-card'
Note warning box visible explaining the action
Success toast 'Reminder job triggered successfully' shown
Page refreshes to show updated execution results
global_reminder_settings: Can change interval value (tested with 2, 3, 5 days)
execution_history_section: Refresh button works to reload data
sidebar_scheduler_link: Scheduler link visible in sidebar for Super Admin
Clock icon displayed next to 'Scheduler' text
Link highlighted when on Scheduler page

critical_code_review_comments: Good use of data-testid attributes on all interactive elements
Proper loading state handling with Skeleton components
Error handling with toast notifications for API failures
Access control check for super_admin role before rendering page
API client properly configured with token authentication
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Used existing super_admin user and scheduler execution logs.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Scheduler Dashboard UI fully tested. All features working - page loads, displays scheduler status, supports manual trigger with toast feedback, allows configuration of reminder settings (enable/disable toggle and interval input), shows execution history with detailed stats. All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing.
